attributes.additional_details: From 09/12/2010 Mr speaker in the name of John Bercow announced the vote which lead to the change in university tution fees which disadvantaged many within the UK. Yet, this government are searching for initiative ideas from students to boost the UK's economy. This has lead to demotivated students going to university which potentially will have a huge debt. Within Europe we - England where this has occurred- are ranked 1st in terms recieving higher education at this kind of valve. As a student I believe this is awfully wrong.
